column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I've been wanting to try this and when I finally had the chance
column2: it didn't disappoint! I have my days where I crave ramen and this place really fills that cravings. I always get tonkotsu
column3: it's my go-to order! For sides
column5: crispy chicken and takoyaki. The combination might be weird to others but the flavor does it for me. I love coming here! The atmosphere is really nice and very aesthetic! The food will make you full because it is serve in large portions
